info.name: nginx version detect
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some nginx servers have the version on the response header. Useful when you need to find specific CVEs on your targets.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: datapass.api.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Accept-Ranges: bytes Cache-Control: no-store, must-revalidate Content-Disposition: inline; filename="index.html" Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 12 Sep 2021 03:16:22 GMT Etag: "2a8f24a31467f00d1bc3e507559a243f7fc4b283" Server: nginx/1.10.3 (Ubuntu) Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15552000 Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Robots-Tag: noindex,nofollow DataPass - gestion des habilitations juridiques pour les données à accès restreint

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: datapass.api.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Accept-Ranges: bytes Cache-Control: no-store, must-revalidate Content-Disposition: inline; filename="index.html" Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 12 Sep 2021 03:16:33 GMT Etag: "2a8f24a31467f00d1bc3e507559a243f7fc4b283" Server: nginx/1.10.3 (Ubuntu) Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15552000 Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Robots-Tag: noindex,nofollow DataPass - gestion des habilitations juridiques pour les données à accès restreint

info.name: OpenSSH Username Enumeration
author: r3dg33k
daffainfo
info.description: OpenSSH through 7.7 is prone to a user enumeration vulnerability due to not delaying bailout for an invalid authenticating user until after the packet containing the request has been fully parsed, related to auth2-gss.c, auth2-hostbased.c, and auth2-pubkey.c.

info.name: HTTP Missing Security Headers
author: socketz
geeknik
g4l1t0
convisoappsec
kurohost
dawid-czarnecki
info.description: It searches missing security headers, but obviously, could be so less generic and could be useless for Bug Bounty.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: datapass.api.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
